# Black body radiation

## Equation

$$ g(\epsilon) = {8\pi V \over h^3c_0^3} \epsilon^2 {1 \over \exp \left({\epsilon \over k_BT}\right)-1} $$

```{julia}
#| label: using-things
#| eval: true
#| include: false

using Plots
```

## Calculation

```{julia}
#| label: using-things
#| eval: true
#| include: true

c = 3.0e8
h = 6.626e-34
kb = 1.381e-23

function blackbody(位s::Float64, t::Float64)
    first_term = 2 * h * c^2 / 位s^5
    @. inside_exp = h * c / 位s / kb / t
    @. outside_exp = exp(inside_exp) - 1
    @. second_term = 1 / outside_exp
    first_term .* second_term
end
```

## Plot it

```{julia}
#| label: using-things
#| eval: true
#| include: true

位s = range(start = 0.0, stop = 1000.0, length = 100)
ys = blackbody()
plot(ts, )
```
